page.title: Capture Vision
page.html:
Vision

In our experience, most successful agile software projects start with a strong vision from the business stakeholders. In the fintech sector particularly, it is not always possible for the full business strategy behind any new initiative to be imparted to the IT project team, but being able to share as much as possible about the drivers and ideas inspiring the investment will provide a key focus for the project team and undoubtedly help with a successful delivery. Describing the vision articulately in the digital service playbook will also aid decision making throughout the project as it can act as an arbiter on the direction to take when choices need to be made.

Esparter has a wealth of experience in distilling the crucial aspects of a broad service vision and problem domain into manageable and actionable items that can be used to set the main goals and project key performance indicators (KPIs)

⏪Esparter Digital Service Playbook
